thread.title: Nadine Santos to Lead Pop, Country and Kids Formats at Music Choice
thread.title_full: Nadine Santos to Lead Pop, Country and Kids Formats at Music Choice - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Nadine Santos to Lead Pop, Country and Kids Formats at Music Choice
text:
Strengthens Commitment to Popular Genre
New York, NY (PRWEB) October 26, 2015
Music Choice strengthens its commitment to its Pop formats with the return of Nadine Santos to its programming team. Santos will be responsible for the day to day programming of all Pop stations including its Top 40 and Hot AC formats along with Country and Kids genres across Music Choice Music Channels, On Demand, Video Channels and mobile devices. Santos will be based out of its mid-town offices and report directly to Mic Fox, Director of Programming & Strategy at Music Choice.
Santos worked at Music Choice from 2011-2013 as lead programmer for Music Choice Play linear network. She most recently served as Assistant Program Director/Music Director at 92.3 AMP Radio in New York City where she was responsible for strategic artist initiatives as well as leading the #1 market in breaking new artist. She started her career out in radio at Power 105.1 in NY during the inaugural launch at the station and also worked at Atlantic Records.
Current Rock programmer Gabby Canella, Indie programmer Perry Schwartz and new Country programmer Evan Levy will report directly to Santos. Santos can be reached at nsantos(at)musicchoice.com
For more information about Music Choice log onto http://www.musicchoice.com
About Music Choice:
Music Choice, the multi-platform video and music network, delivers its music programming to millions of consumers nationwide through their televisions, online and mobile devices. Music Choice programs dozens of uninterrupted music channels; produces originals that feature todayâ€™s hottest established and emerging artists; offers thousands of music videos; and launched Music Choice Play, the music video, lifestyle and entertainment network for Millennials. For additional information log on to http://www.MusicChoice.com | Twitter: @MusicChoice | Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/MusicChoice
